item.text: The Lord’s message came to me:

“<st data-num="01121" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="03045" class="">confront</st> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="1" /> with her <st data-num="08441" class="">abominable practices</st>
and say, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says to Jerusalem: Your origin and your birth were in the land of the Canaanites; your father was an Amorite and your mother a Hittite.

As for your <st data-num="04138" class="">birth</st>, on the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> you were <st data-num="03205" class="">born</st> your <st data-num="08270" class="">umbilical cord</st> was <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03772" class="">cut</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">nor</st> were you <st data-num="07364 04935">washed</st> in <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>;<n id="1" /> you were <st data-num="04414" class="">certainly</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04414" class="">rubbed down with salt</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="02853 02853">wrapped with blankets</st>.<n id="2" />
No eye took pity on you to do even one of these things for you to spare you; you were thrown out into the open field because you were detested on the day you were born.
“‘I passed by you and saw you kicking around helplessly in your blood. I said to you as you lay there in your blood, “Live!” I said to you as you lay there in your blood, “Live!”
I made you plentiful like sprouts in a field; you grew tall and came of age so that you could wear jewelry. Your breasts had formed and your hair had grown, but you were still naked and bare.

“‘Then I passed by you and watched you, noticing that you had reached the age for love. I spread my cloak over you and covered your nakedness. I swore a solemn oath to you and entered into a marriage covenant with you, declares the Sovereign Lord, and you became mine.
“‘Then I bathed you in water, washed the blood off you, and anointed you with fragrant oil.

I <st data-num="03847" class="">dressed</st> you in <st data-num="07553" class="">embroidered clothing</st> and <st data-num="05274" class="">put</st> <st data-num="08476" class="">fine leather</st> <st data-num="05274" class="">sandals</st> on your feet. I <st data-num="02280" class="">wrapped</st> you with <st data-num="08336" class="">fine linen</st> and <st data-num="03680" class="">covered</st> you with <st data-num="04897" class="">silk</st>.

I <st data-num="05710" class="">adorned</st> you with <st data-num="05716" class="">jewelry</st>. I <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> <st data-num="06781" class="">bracelets</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> your <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st> and a <st data-num="07242" class="">necklace</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">around</st> your <st data-num="01627" class="">neck</st>.

I <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> a <st data-num="05141" class="">ring</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> your <st data-num="0639" class="">nose</st>, <st data-num="05694" class="">earrings</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> your <st data-num="0241" class="">ears</st>, and a <st data-num="08597" class="">beautiful</st> <st data-num="05850" class="">crown</st> on your <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st>.

You were <st data-num="05710" class="">adorned</st> with <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> and <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>, while your <st data-num="04403" class="">clothing</st> was of <st data-num="08336" class="">fine linen</st>, <st data-num="04897" class="">silk</st>, and <st data-num="07553" class="">embroidery</st>. You <st data-num="0398" class="">ate</st> the <st data-num="05560" class="">finest flour</st>, <st data-num="01706" class="">honey</st>, and <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st>. You <st data-num="03302" class="">became</st> <st data-num="03966 03966">extremely</st> <st data-num="03302" class="">beautiful</st> and <st data-num="06743" class="">attained the position</st> of <st data-num="04410" class="">royalty</st>.
Your fame spread among the nations because of your beauty; your beauty was perfect because of the splendor that I bestowed on you, declares the Sovereign Lord.
“‘But you trusted in your beauty and capitalized on your fame by becoming a prostitute. You offered your sexual favors to every man who passed by so that your beauty became his.

You <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> some of your <st data-num="0899" class="">clothing</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> for yourself <st data-num="02921" class="">decorated</st> <st data-num="01116" class="">high places</st>; you <st data-num="02181" class="">engaged in prostitution</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> them. You <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> to him to <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> his.<n id="1" />

You also <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> your <st data-num="08597" class="">beautiful</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">jewelry</st>, made of my <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> and my <st data-num="03701 0834">silver</st> I had <st data-num="05414" class="">given</st> to you, and <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> for yourself <st data-num="02145" class="">male</st> <st data-num="06754" class="">images</st> and <st data-num="02181" class="">engaged in prostitution</st><n id="1" /> with them.

You <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> your <st data-num="07553" class="">embroidered</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">clothing</st> and used it to <st data-num="03680" class="">cover</st> them; you <st data-num="05414" class="">offered</st> my <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> and my <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">to</st> them.
As for my food that I gave you—the fine flour, olive oil, and honey I fed you—you placed it before them as a soothing aroma. That is exactly what happened, declares the Sovereign Lord.
“‘You took your sons and your daughters whom you bore to me and you sacrificed them as food for the idols to eat. As if your prostitution was not enough,
you <st data-num="07819" class="">slaughtered</st> my <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st> and <st data-num="05414 05674">sacrificed</st> them to the idols.<n id="1" />
And with all your abominable practices and prostitution you did not remember the days of your youth when you were naked and bare, kicking around in your blood.
“‘After all your evil—“Woe! Woe to you!” declares the Sovereign Lord—

you <st data-num="01129" class="">built</st> yourself a <st data-num="01354" class="">chamber</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="06213" class="">put up</st> a <st data-num="07413" class="">pavilion</st><n id="2" /> in <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="07339" class="">public square</st>.

<st data-num="0413" class="">At</st> the <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st> of <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">street</st> you <st data-num="01129" class="">erected</st> your <st data-num="07413" class="">pavilion</st>, and you <st data-num="08581" class="">disgraced</st><n id="1" /> your <st data-num="03308" class="">beauty</st> when you <st data-num="06589" class="">spread</st><n id="2" /> your <st data-num="07272" class="">legs</st> to <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="05674" class="">passerby</st> and <st data-num="07235" class="">multiplied</st> your <st data-num="08457" class="">promiscuity</st>.

You <st data-num="02181" class="">engaged in prostitution</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="01121 04714">Egyptians</st>, your <st data-num="01432 01320">lustful</st> <st data-num="07934" class="">neighbors</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07235" class="">multiplying</st> your <st data-num="08457" class="">promiscuity</st> and <st data-num="03707" class="">provoking</st> me <st data-num="03707" class="">to anger</st>.

So <st data-num="02009" class="">see here</st>, I have <st data-num="05186" class="">stretched out</st> my <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> you and <st data-num="01639" class="">cut off</st> your <st data-num="02706" class="">rations</st>. I have <st data-num="05414" class="">delivered</st> you into the <st data-num="05315" class="">power</st> of those who <st data-num="08130" class="">hate</st> you, the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> of the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st>, who were <st data-num="03637" class="">ashamed</st> of your <st data-num="02154" class="">obscene</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">conduct</st>.

You <st data-num="02181" class="">engaged in prostitution</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="01121 0804">Assyrians</st> because your desires were <st data-num="01115 07646">insatiable</st>; you <st data-num="02181" class="">prostituted</st> yourself with them and <st data-num="01571" class="">yet</st> you were still <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07654" class="">satisfied</st>.
Then you multiplied your promiscuity to the land of merchants, Babylonia, but you were not satisfied there either.
“‘How sick is your heart, declares the Sovereign Lord, when you perform all these acts, the deeds of a bold prostitute.
When you built your chamber at the head of every street and put up your pavilion in every public square, you were not like a prostitute, because you scoffed at payment.
“‘Adulterous wife, who prefers strangers instead of her own husband!

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> <st data-num="02181" class="">prostitutes</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="05078" class="">payment</st>,<n id="1" /> but instead <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> <st data-num="05083" class="">gifts</st> to <st data-num="03605" class="">every one</st> of your <st data-num="0157" class="">lovers</st>. You <st data-num="07809" class="">bribe</st> them to <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you from <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st> for your <st data-num="08457" class="">sexual favors</st>!
You were different from other prostitutes because no one solicited you. When you gave payment and no payment was given to you, you became the opposite!
“‘Therefore, you prostitute, listen to the Lord’s message!

This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Because your lust was poured out and your nakedness was uncovered in your prostitution with your lovers, and because of all your detestable idols, and because of the blood of your children you have given to them,

<st data-num="03651" class="">therefore</st>, <st data-num="02005" class="">take note</st>: I am about to <st data-num="06908" class="">gather</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="0157" class="">lovers</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> you <st data-num="06149 05921">enjoyed</st>, both <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">those</st> you <st data-num="0157" class="">loved</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">and</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">those</st> you <st data-num="08130" class="">hated</st>. I will <st data-num="06908" class="">gather</st> them <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> you from <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st>, and I will <st data-num="01540" class="">expose</st> your <st data-num="06172" class="">nakedness</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them, and they will <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="06172" class="">nakedness</st>.<n id="1" />

I will <st data-num="08199" class="">punish</st> you <st data-num="04941" class="">as</st> an <st data-num="05003" class="">adulteress</st> and <st data-num="08210 01818">murderer</st> <st data-num="04941" class="">deserves</st>.<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="05414" class="">avenge</st> your <st data-num="01818" class="">bloody deeds</st> with <st data-num="07068" class="">furious</st> <st data-num="02534" class="">rage</st>.<n id="2" />

I will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> you into their <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st>, and they will <st data-num="02040" class="">destroy</st> your <st data-num="01354" class="">chambers</st> and <st data-num="05422" class="">tear down</st> your <st data-num="07413" class="">pavilions</st>. They will <st data-num="06584" class="">strip</st> you of your <st data-num="0899" class="">clothing</st> and <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> your <st data-num="08597" class="">beautiful</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">jewelry</st> and <st data-num="03240" class="">leave</st> you <st data-num="05903" class="">naked</st> and <st data-num="06181" class="">bare</st>.

They will <st data-num="05927 05921">summon</st> a <st data-num="06951" class="">mob</st> who will <st data-num="07275 068">stone</st> you and <st data-num="01333" class="">hack</st> you <st data-num="01333" class="">in pieces</st> with their <st data-num="02719" class="">swords</st>.

They will <st data-num="08313" class="">burn</st> <st data-num="0784" class="">down</st> your <st data-num="01004" class="">houses</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">execute</st> <st data-num="08201" class="">judgments</st> on you <st data-num="05869" class="">in front of</st> <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st>. Thus I will <st data-num="07673" class="">put a stop</st> to your <st data-num="02181" class="">prostitution</st>, <st data-num="01571" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">longer</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> <st data-num="0868" class="">gifts</st> to your clients.<n id="1" />
I will exhaust my rage on you, and then my fury will turn from you. I will calm down and no longer be angry.

“‘Because you did not remember the days of your youth and have enraged me with all these deeds, I hereby repay you for what you have done, declares the Sovereign Lord. Have you not engaged in prostitution on top of all your other abominable practices?
“‘Observe—everyone who quotes proverbs will quote this proverb about you: “Like mother, like daughter.”

<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> are the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> of your <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>, who <st data-num="01602" class="">detested</st> her <st data-num="0376" class="">husband</st> and her <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, and <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are the <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st> of your <st data-num="0269" class="">sisters</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="01602" class="">detested</st> their <st data-num="0582" class="">husbands</st> and their <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>. Your <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st> was a <st data-num="02850" class="">Hittite</st> and your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> an <st data-num="0567" class="">Amorite</st>.

Your <st data-num="01419" class="">older</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st> was <st data-num="08111 01931">Samaria</st>, who <st data-num="03427" class="">lived</st> <st data-num="05921 08040">north</st><n id="1" /> of you with her <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>, and your <st data-num="06996 04480">younger</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st>, who <st data-num="03427" class="">lived</st> <st data-num="03225" class="">south</st><n id="2" /> of you, was <st data-num="05467" class="">Sodom</st><n id="3" /> with her <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>.

Have you <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">copied</st> their <st data-num="01870" class="">behavior</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="06213" class="">practiced</st> their <st data-num="08441" class="">abominable deeds</st>? In a <st data-num="06985" class="">short</st> <st data-num="04592" class="">time</st><n id="2" /> you <st data-num="07843" class="">became</st> even more <st data-num="07843" class="">depraved</st> in <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="01870" class="">conduct</st> than <st data-num="02004" class="">they</st> were!
As surely as I live, declares the Sovereign Lord, your sister Sodom and her daughters never behaved as wickedly as you and your daughters have behaved.
“‘See here—this was the iniquity of your sister Sodom: She and her daughters had majesty, abundance of food, and enjoyed carefree ease, but they did not help the poor and needy.

They <st data-num="01361" class="">were haughty</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">practiced</st> <st data-num="08441" class="">abominable deeds</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> me. Therefore, <st data-num="0834" class="">when</st> I <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> it I <st data-num="05493" class="">removed</st> them.

<st data-num="08111" class="">Samaria</st> has <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02398" class="">committed</st> <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st> the <st data-num="02403" class="">sins</st> you have; you have <st data-num="07235" class="">done more</st> <st data-num="08441" class="">abominable deeds</st> than <st data-num="02007" class="">they</st> did.<n id="1" /> You have <st data-num="06663" class="">made</st> your <st data-num="0269" class="">sisters</st> <st data-num="06663" class="">appear righteous</st> with <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="08441 0834">abominable things</st> you have <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st>.

So now, bear your disgrace, because you have given your sisters reason to justify their behavior. Because the sins you have committed were more abominable than those of your sisters; they have become more righteous than you. So now, be ashamed and bear the disgrace of making your sisters appear righteous.
“‘I will restore their fortunes, the fortunes of Sodom and her daughters, and the fortunes of Samaria and her daughters (along with your fortunes among them),

<st data-num="04616" class="">so that</st> you may <st data-num="05375" class="">bear</st> your <st data-num="03639" class="">disgrace</st> and <st data-num="03637" class="">be ashamed</st> of <st data-num="03605 0834">all</st> you have <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> in <st data-num="05162" class="">consoling</st> them.

As for your <st data-num="0269" class="">sisters</st>, <st data-num="05467" class="">Sodom</st> and her <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> will be <st data-num="07725" class="">restored</st> to their <st data-num="06927" class="">former status</st>, <st data-num="08111" class="">Samaria</st> and her <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> will be <st data-num="07725" class="">restored</st> to their <st data-num="06927" class="">former status</st>, and <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> and your <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> will be <st data-num="07725" class="">restored</st> to your <st data-num="06927" class="">former status</st>.

In your <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> of <st data-num="01347" class="">majesty</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05467" class="">Sodom</st> your <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st> a <st data-num="08052" class="">byword</st> in your <st data-num="06310" class="">mouth</st>,

<st data-num="02962" class="">before</st> your <st data-num="07451" class="">evil</st> was <st data-num="01540" class="">exposed</st>? <st data-num="03644 06256">Now</st> you have become an <st data-num="02781" class="">object of scorn</st> to the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> of <st data-num="0758" class="">Aram</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> those <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> her and to the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> of the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st>—those <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st> you who <st data-num="07590" class="">despise</st> you.
You must bear your punishment for your obscene conduct and your abominable practices, declares the Lord.
“‘For this is what the Sovereign Lord says: I will deal with you according to what you have done when you despised your oath by breaking your covenant.

Yet <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="02142" class="">remember</st> the <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> I made <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> you in the <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> of your <st data-num="05271" class="">youth</st>, and I will <st data-num="06965" class="">establish</st> a <st data-num="05769" class="">lasting</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> with you.

Then you will <st data-num="02142" class="">remember</st> your <st data-num="01870" class="">conduct</st> and <st data-num="03637" class="">be ashamed</st> when you <st data-num="03947" class="">receive</st> your <st data-num="01419 04480">older</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">and</st> <st data-num="06996 04480">younger</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">sisters</st>. I will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> them to you as <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>, but <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> on account of my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> with you.
I will establish my covenant with you, and then you will know that I am the Lord.
Then you will remember, be ashamed, and remain silent because of your disgrace when I make atonement for all you have done, declares the Sovereign Lord.’”
